unnormalised: Arre, tuka khobor asli kai Bharat 26/01/1950 vellar ganrajy zalo mhunn? Kal zalea bhaxen dista, punn tem 74 vorsam adhi aslem!
normalised: Arre, tumka khobor asa India satavis Janerak ek hazar novshem panchashak ganrajya zali mhunn? Kal zalem te bhaxen dista, punn tevhaun chovteer vorsam adhi zalem!
